RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the area: area covered by the Cotulla, Texas station
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the back seat: back seat of Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the seat: seat in Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Orona-Sanchez case: a case referenced in the ruling where passenger behavior was deemed insufficient to justify a stop, with passengers slouching down
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Lamas case: a case referenced in the ruling with similar passenger behavior, less suspicious than the case at hand
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Pacheco case: a case referenced in the ruling where passengers 'hunkered down' in the seat, considered less suspicious than active evasion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Pena-Cantu case: a case referenced in the ruling with less suspicious passenger conduct, used for comparison
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia: the defendant in the legal case, owner of the vehicle stopped by border patrol agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.area covered by the Cotulla, Texas stati: region served by border patrol agents with a history of illegal alien traffic, relevant to the context of the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle: vehicle searched for undocumented aliens, subject of a court case, and used by Maria De Jesus Garcia during the incident, exhibiting suspicious behavior
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.back seat of Maria De Jesus Garcia's veh: location where passengers were found attempting to conceal themselves, contributing to the justification of the stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.seat in Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle: general location where passenger behavior was observed, including attempts to hide or evade detection
